A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm honestly shocked at most of the user reviews to this movie. It was one of the best Star Wars movies I've ever seen and I will be going back to see it again at some point. I think the majority of the bad reviews are coming from OG fans that watched the trilogy when it was first released\, and while I understand the pain that you must be feeling\, all good things must come to an end and be given over to the new era of Star Wars. Nothing lasts forever. Not even Luke Skywalker.
